page.title: 12Health care in Lorton
page.content: All the statutory provisions such as home helps, health visitors and home nursing are available. The nearest doctors, dentists and chemists are in Cockermouth - 4 miles away. A visit to a doctor's surgery could be made by the one bus a week but people with cars help those without for this and for visits to hospitals. Cockermouth has a much valued Cottage Hospital where emergency treatment is available. The hospital at Whitehaven - 18 miles away treats most cases and all hospital births. Antenatal care is available at a clinic in Cockermouth and from some G.P.'s. A private hospital has recently opened in Workington. The infirm elderly go to sheltered accommodation in Cockermouth or to the geriatric ward of the Cottage Hospital.
